expo.name: Where You've Been
expo.description:
Where You’ve Been (Demo) is an app for storing, categorising, and rating the places you’ve been. It’s a fun way to check out all the interesting places you’ve visited. In its current implementation, it is designed to be a personal (done-)list and not shared amongst others.

All built-in accounts use the password "1234", the default account is "sarah@mail.com", there is also "katie@mail.com", and "justin@mail.com".
